game_description: Can you make it to the end of the tunnel? Got what it takes to be the ultimate tunnel runner? Race at incredible speeds through over 1000 varying tunnels avoiding anything that gets in your way. Features: - Race down tunnels and along pipes avoiding everything - Endless play - Mercy shields to help you along - Progressive difficulty system to keep you on your feet
review_1: Like, you’re running dude. Seriously and it’s fun and challenging. Once you get in the swing of controlling your character it’s a blast.
